description: This flaming cocktail is a great way to light up the night and show off to your family and friends. This variation to the classic&nbsp;Hot Toddy recipe is made from a scotch base, whose flavor is sweetened by sugar and made more classy with a lemon garnish.
name: Blue Blazer
recipeIngredient: 3 oz. Boiling water (plus more boiling water to heat mugs)

recipeInstructions.name: Preheat your glass mugs. To do this, add some boiling water to your glass and let it sit for a few minutes. Then, throw the water out before adding your cocktail.

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the scotch, sugar, and boiling water into one of your mugs. Ignite it with a match.
